project.name: Helios Datalake
project.scope: Unified ELT to Snowflake, dbt modeling, Kafka ingestion

sections.title: Introduction & Context Setting
sections.goal: Establish the candidate's understanding of the Helios Datalake project, their role expectations, and alignment with company mission and values.
sample_questions: Can you summarize your understanding of the Helios Datalake scope and current phase?
How do you see your data engineering skills fitting into a regulated industry context?
Which of Novereon’s values resonate most with your professional approach?

sections.title: Technical Foundations in ELT and Tooling
sections.goal: Assess candidate’s depth in ELT pipelines, dbt modeling, and Kafka ingestion relevant to Helios Datalake.
sample_questions: Walk me through how you would design an ELT pipeline from a streaming Kafka topic to Snowflake.
In dbt, how do you manage model dependencies and ensure data lineage is clear?
What strategies do you use for handling schema evolution in an ingestion pipeline?

sections.title: Operational Resilience & Runbook Familiarity
sections.goal: Evaluate the candidate’s readiness to handle operational incidents using existing artifacts like RB-ING-042.
sample_questions: If ingestion fails mid-batch, how would you use RB-ING-042 to recover?
Describe an incident where you had to limit BLAST_RADIUS—what steps did you take?
How do you ensure SLA-HEL-01 (99.9% availability) is not breached during maintenance?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify candidate’s ability to navigate dependencies between Helios Datalake and other projects (e.g., Borealis ETL, Nimbus Observability).
sample_questions: How might changes in Borealis ETL’s CDC strategy (RFC-1711) impact Helios ingestion?
If Nimbus Observability changes its sampling strategy (RFC-1114), how would you adapt monitoring for Helios pipelines?
Can you describe a scenario where upstream API changes from Janus API Composition could disrupt your dbt models?

sections.title: Decision-Making & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Understand how the candidate balances performance, cost, and compliance in design decisions.
sample_questions: When optimizing for query performance in Snowflake, how do you weigh storage costs?
Describe a tradeoff you made between pipeline latency and data accuracy.
How do you ensure compliance with POL-SEC-001 in automated data flows?

sections.title: Closing & Candidate Questions
sections.goal: Allow the candidate to clarify expectations, demonstrate curiosity, and express interest.
sample_questions: What would you need from the team to succeed in this role?
Do you have questions about our runbooks, RFC process, or SLA definitions?
Which aspect of Helios Datalake excites you most?
